word: The time came that I must speak. All collected, and parties which had taken a boat ride came to hear, so I had quite a congregation, and the Lord gave me perfect freedom in speaking to them. All seemed to feel well satisfied with the day of recreation.--Ms 86, 1893, pp. 10, 11. (Diary--October 8 to November 11, 1893, "Labors at Gisborne, New Zealand.")
